response.overview: An intimate flipside of BE-IN, visits homes, parks and "offices" of the Haight-Ashbury neighborhood - tearing out discrete images of daily life and composing them into montage episodes. This sequence of short poems, separated by black, follows the contour of one day in HA. Featured are the Grateful Dead at home, Oracle newspaper office, Diggers' Free Food in the Park, the Free Frame of Reference, and many friends. Like BE-IN, performed on the homemade optical printer. Too visually intricate for sound, this oneâ€™s all for your eyes.
response.title: Tribal Home Movie #2
